parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering column shaft can cause the loss of steering control, leading to accidents or near-misses.
symptoms: Abnormal noise coming from the steering wheel
stiff or erratic steering
loss of power steering assist
steering wheel detaching without warning
vehicle drifting to the left or right without input on the steering wheel.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the power steering system can cause the loss of steering control, leading to accidents or near-misses.
symptoms: Stiff or erratic steering
loss of power steering assist
difficulty turning the wheel
especially when cold or during quick turns.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Corrosion of the steering shaft can cause the loss of steering control, leading to accidents or near-misses.
symptoms: Abnormal noise coming from the steering wheel
stiff or erratic steering
loss of power steering assist
vehicle drifting to the left or right without input on the steering wheel.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Failure to properly repair recalled vehicles can lead to ongoing safety issues and potential accidents.
symptoms: Recalled vehicles not repaired or repaired with faulty parts
leading to ongoing safety issues.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The unintended acceleration of the vehicle can cause accidents, injuries, and fatalities, as well as damage to property.
symptoms: The vehicle accelerates suddenly and unexpectedly

often when the driver is braking or decelerating; the engine RPM increases rapidly; the vehicle surges forward or backward; the brakes may not respond as expected; the vehicle may crash into other objects or vehicles.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunction of the cruise control system can cause unintended acceleration, leading to accidents, injuries, and fatalities, as well as damage to property.
symptoms: The vehicle accelerates suddenly and unexpectedly when using cruise control; the vehicle fails to respond to braking or deceleration inputs; the engine RPM increases rapidly; the vehicle surges forward or backward.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunction of the brake pedal can cause unintended acceleration, leading to accidents, injuries, and fatalities, as well as damage to property.
symptoms: The brake pedal feels soft or spongy; the brake pedal does not respond as expected; the vehicle accelerates suddenly and unexpectedly when braking; the engine RPM increases rapidly.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the instrument cluster display can cause the odometer, speedometer, and fuel readings to malfunction, making it difficult for the driver to monitor the vehicle's performance and safety.
symptoms: The odometer reading fades out
the digital speedometer and fuel readings flash on and off
and the instrument panel lights may not function.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the LCM can cause various lighting systems to malfunction, including the hazard warning lights, headlights, and turn signals, which can increase the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The hazard warning lights do not work
the headlights stay on even when turned off
and the turn signals may not function.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Heating and Air Conditioning (HVAC) Control Unit Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the HVAC control unit can cause the heating system to malfunction, making it uncomfortable for the driver and passengers.
symptoms: The heating system does not respond when the heat option is selected
and the temperature control may not function properly.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the electrical system can cause various systems to malfunction, including the trunk lid release, instrument panel lights, and headlights, which can increase the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The trunk lid does not open using the remote control or button
all lights on the instrument panel go out
and the headlights may not function.
